mapper.select: select tecInfo.id, tecInfo.name, a.id as technologyInfoId, a.name as technologyInfoName, a.stuOrTec as stuOrTec, a.code, a.deduct_num from ((SELECT detail.id, tec.paper_id as stuOrTec, detail.degree, detail.deduct_num, detail.code, detail.technology_info_id, info.name from aa_identify_tec tec left join aa_identify_tec_detail detail on detail.indentity_tec_id = tec.id left join aa_technology_info info on info.id = detail.technology_info_id where tec.paper_id = #{paperId} ) UNION All (SELECT detail.id, tec.exam_user_id as stuOrTec, detail.degree, detail.deduct_num, detail.code, detail.technology_info_id, info.name from aa_identify_tec tec left join aa_identify_tec_detail detail on detail.indentity_tec_id = tec.id left join aa_technology_info info on info.id = detail.technology_info_id where tec.exam_user_id = #{examUserId} ) ) a left join aa_technology_info tecInfo on tecInfo.id = a.technology_info_id

select result.exam_user_id, result.score_points, result.right_or_wrong, result.teacher_answer, result.student_answer from aa_exam_results_detail result left join aa_exam_score_classify class on class.id = result.score_classify_id where class.exam_score_info_id = '1151028180615991297' and result.exam_user_id = #{examUserId}

select class.id, class.exam_score_info_id, class.score as classTotalScore, info.name as name, (select sum(score) from aa_exam_results_detail where score_classify_id = class.id and exam_user_id = detail.exam_user_id GROUP BY score_classify_id) totalScore, detail.id as detailId, detail.exam_user_id, detail.score_points, detail.score, detail.score_info, detail.student_answer, detail.teacher_answer, detail.right_or_wrong, pictureType.id as pictureTypeId from aa_exam_results_detail detail left join aa_exam_score_classify class on class.id = detail.score_classify_id left join aa_exam_score_info info on class.exam_score_info_id = info.id left join aa_picture_type pictureType on pictureType.name = detail.score_points left join aa_exam_score_info infoa on infoa.name = detail.score_points where detail.exam_user_id = #{id} and class.exam_id = #{examId} order by info.sort,infoa.sort
